duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to project scoping, design, implementation, and testing of AGV products and systems.
Mentor and assist other team members.
Identify and implement improvements in work organization, design methods, and engineering standards.
Develop a more suitable controls platform for AGV controls phase 1.
Assist with the new platform hardware rollout.
Support ongoing controls development and rollouts for Phase #2 & #3.
Keep accurate and up-to-date records of all work done and be involved in Quality Control inspections to ensure work completion.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in Automation and Controls.
